T09TD4155.2E:325a-42: re drug pa snyan ngag mkhan /
T09TD4155.2E:325a-43: go gcig pa shi bo legs bshad /
T09TD4155.2E:325a-44: brgya dang gnyis pa seng ge /
T09TD4155.2E:325a-45: brgya dang bdun pa zas gtsang ma rnams shes rab la sbyar /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-0: mthar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshul rtag tu dam pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang rang gi re ba dang @325b mthun par bsam pa kun yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yin la /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-1: de nyid rtogs brjod du rgyas par bye ba ni /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-9: bcu bzhi pa cho 'phrul bstan pa /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-12: bcu bdun pa byams pa lung bstan /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-13: bcu dgu pa sh'a ri'i bu /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-14: nyi shu pa gro bzhin bye ba rna /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-15: nyer gcig pa aa mra skyong /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-16: nyer gnyis pa rgyal byed tshal yongs su bzung ba /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-17: nyer gsum pa yab sras mjal ba /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-18: nyer lnga pa mngon par byung ba /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-19: nyer drug pa bdud bcom pa /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-21: nyer brgyad pa gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-23: so bzhi pa dga' bo nyer dga' btul ba /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-28: zhe gcig pa au ta ya /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-30: zhe bzhi pa gser lag / zhe lnga pa ma skyes dgra /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-31: zhe bdun pa s'a la'i sdong bu /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-32: zhe dgu pa glang po can /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-33: lnga bcu pa las bcu spyad pa /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-34: nga drug pa ba lang skyong btul ba /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-36: nga dgu pa ku l'a la /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-43: re dgu pa chos rgyal rab gnas /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-44: bdun cu pa nyi ma gung pa /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-45: don gcig pa sha na'i gos can /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-47: don gsum pa klu la springs pa /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-48: don bzhi pa sa gzhi phul ba /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-49: don lnga pa rten 'brel bcu gnyis /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-50: don drug pa bi du ra /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-51: don bdun pa ke na ya ka / don brgyad pa brgya byin lhung ba /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-53: gya gcig pa rgyu'i mchog / gya gnyis pa dmyal ba mngon ldan /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-54: gya gsum pa sgra gcan zin /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-55: gya bzhi pa sbrang rtsi dbyangs /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-59: go gsum pa ma ga dha /
T09TD4155.2E:325b-60: go bzhi pa grags pa'i bshes gnyen /
T09TD4155.2E:326a-0: brgya dang lnga pa ree ba ti'i yal 'dab rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'bras bu'i mdzad pa la sbyar nas bshad ma thag pa'i mdzad pa de dag thams cad @326a * //
T09TD4155.2E:326a-1: khyad chos gnyis pa rjod byed kyi tshig rgyan nyams dang 'gyur ba stong gis ngo mtshar bas 'di las lhag pa gzhan du tshol mi dogs pa'i chog shes shing rgya na sbyor tshul log pa sogs rtsom pa'i skyon gyi dri ma cung zad tsam yang spags pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i yal 'dab brgya rtsa brgyad pa ngo mtshar ba'i rgyan gyis blo ldan rnams kyi yid rang dbang du 'phrog cing /
T09TD4155.2E:326a-2: khyad chos gsum pa rnam par rgyas pa'i sdeb sbyor gyi yal ga mtha' klas pa can rin chen 'byung gnas sogs nas bshad pa'i lci yang 'khrul pa med pas gcod mtshams phyed /
T09TD4155.2E:326a-3: khyad chos bzhi pa phul du byung ba'i grags pa'i snyan pa ming gi mngon brjod mdzes pas dkar ba me tog gi landzar g-yur du za ba la brten nas /
T09TD4155.2E:326a-4: dpal ldan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtogs brjod kyi ljon pa chen po skyes bu dam pa'i thugs rje'i grib bsil dang ldan pa la lus can kun bde bar ngal gso ba 'di nyid phyogs dus kun tu rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig / ces shis pa brjod pa'i mdor bstan rgyas bshad kyi legs bshad nyi ma chen po 'di nyid mngon sum du lta ba'i skal bar gyur na log rtog gi mun pa thams cad bsangs par 'gyur ro //
T09TD4155.2E:326a-5: de yang rjes pan gyi gsung chos kyi rgyal po 'phags pa'i thugs la nye bar bzhag ste bla ma chos kyi rgyal po dang dpon chen sh'akya bzang po gnyis kyi bdag rkyen la brten nas 'jig rten gyi mig gcig pu snyigs dus kyi thams cad mkhyen pa shong ston lo ts'a ba rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'phags yul gyi snyan dngags mkhan chen po lakshm'i ka ra la brten nas mang yul 'phags pa'i drung du bod kyi skad du legs par bsgyur /
T09TD4155.2E:326a-6: de nas bzung ste zha lu lo ts'a ba rin chen chos skyong bzang po dngos kyi slob mar bcas pa'i bar du gtsug lag 'di nyid la dpyis phyin par sbyangs pa'i mkhas pa nam mkha'i skar tshogs lta bur gyur cing /
T09TD4155.2E:326a-7: de nas dus kyi dbang gis legs par sbyangs pa'i dpyod ldan ches cher dkon na'ang rgyun cung zad ma nyams tsam gnas pa las rtogs brjod rin po che 'di'i dka' ba'i gnad rnams kyis zhib mor bshad pa'i brgyud pa ni /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-0: shong ston nas rim pa @326b bzhin gcung lo chen blo gros brtan pa /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa dbang lo chen po /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-3: lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-4: lo chen nam mkha' bzang po /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-8: gnas brtan legs pa rgyal mtshan /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-9: zha lu lo chen chos skyong bzang po /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-10: de'i dbon pad dkar chos skyong /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-11: grangs chen lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal rdo rje /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-12: smon 'gro pandi ta rig gnas rgya mtsho'i phreng ba 'dzin pa tshe dbang don grub /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-13: rigs chos kyi sras 'jam dbyangs dbang rgyal rdo rje'i drung du skad gnyis smra ba za hor gyi bande ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtshos thos so //
T09TD4155.2E:326b-14: lung rkyang gi brgyud pa ni /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-15: chos rgyal dge ba'i dbang po /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-18: shong lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-21: dpang lo ts'a ba blo gros brtan pa /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-22: lo chen byang chub rtse mo /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-23: lo ts'a ba grags pa rgyal mtshan /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-24: bo dong phyogs las rnam rgyal /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-25: stag lung pa ngag dbang grags pa /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-26: kun spangs rnam rgyal grags pa /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-27: 'bum rab 'byams pa rin chen chos dbang /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-28: rab 'byams pa tshul khrims dbang phyug / dpal khang lo ts'a ba dbyangs can snyems pa'i sde /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-29: mdo khams pa yon tan rgya mtsho /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-30: 'bras spungs pa tshe dbang bkra shis /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-32: kun bzang rtse ba dbang phyug rgyal mtshan /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-33: bla ma rdo rje rgyal mtshan /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-34: dpal 'byor gling pa ngag dbang rnam rgyal /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-35: rigs brgya'i khyab bdag mgon po bsod nams mchog ldan //
T09TD4155.2E:326b-36: zur rdo rje 'chang chos dbyings rang grol /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-37: yang na dpal khang lo ts'a nas /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-38: rgya ston byang chub dbang rgyal /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-39: 'jam dbyangs kun mkhyen tshe dbang nas /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-40: rje chos dbyings rang grol gyi bar gong bzhin te /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-41: de las bdag gis nos shing /
T09TD4155.2E:326b-42: bstan pa rin po che'i rgyun la bsams nas thos bsam gyi ched du 'chad nyan sgo gsum 'bad pas bsgrubs pa las bzang rdzu 'ug pa sbos pa'i 'gying tshul lhur len pa rnams dang 'dra ba ni ma yin no //
T09TD4155.2E:327a-0: de yang srid pa mtha' dag me 'bar ba'i klong ltar sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin can du shes nas 'khor ba las rnam par @327a * //
T09TD4155.2E:327a-1: grol ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang don du gnyer ba'i nges 'byung gi bsam pas zin pa'i gang zag ches dkon na'ang /
T09TD4155.2E:327a-2: dus kyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs spyod la sred pa ches cher 'phel kyang mang du thos pa'i tshul la blo sna bstungs te /
T09TD4155.2E:327a-3: nges 'byung spu sud kyi rnam pas gsol 'debs thang thung dang bzlas bsgom sems khrid sad sud kyi yig cha la sha rul la sbrang ma 'thibs pa ltar 'du zhing /
T09TD4155.2E:327a-4: gzhung chen po rnams yal bar 'dor ba'i dbang gis gangs ri'i ljongs 'dir dus kyi 'khor lo'i yig cha la mkhas rlom gzhan gyi brtsam chos gang gis kyang bsgrun du med pa grags pa don ldan gyi mkhas grub chen po nor bzang rgya mtshos mdzad pa'i sngon med kyi legs bshad dri med 'od rgyan par du 'khod na'ang don du gnyer ba ches dkon pas /
T09TD4155.2E:327a-5: rtogs brjod rin po che 'di nyid kyang par du brkos pa par mkhan rnams kyi yan lag ngal ba'i dka' thub lhur len pa tsam du zad mod /
T09TD4155.2E:327a-6: 'on te rgya gar gyi pan chen kha spu can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa gsar du brtsams pa dang /
T09TD4155.2E:327a-7: skad gnyis smra ba'i lo ts'a ba rnams kyis bsgyur zhing rjes 'jug gi bstan 'dzin mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnams kyis dar rgyas su mdzad pa ni rang nyid mkhas par bsgrub pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang gya tshom gyis tshul der zhugs pa ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa med pa'i 'gro ba rnams dad pa gsar du spel ba dang /
T09TD4155.2E:327a-8: dad pa dang ldan pa rnams gong nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur bas rang gzhan gyi bsod nams dpag tu med pa gsog pa'i phyir dkon mchog t'a la las /
T09TD4155.2E:327a-9: dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar bskyed pa ste //
T09TD4155.2E:327a-10: yon tan thams cad bsrung zhing 'phel bar byed //
T09TD4155.2E:327a-11: dogs pa sel zhing chu bo rnams las sgrol //
T09TD4155.2E:327a-12: dad pas bde 'gro'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin //
T09TD4155.2E:327a-15: grags pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa bzang po 'di rnams kyis //
T09TD4155.2E:327a-16: bde bar gshegs gyur lam rnams gang yin bstan par 'gyur //
T09TD4155.2E:327a-17: yid la dad pa med pa rnams kyang dad par 'gyur //
T09TD4155.2E:327b-0: chos dang ldan pa'i @327b gtam gyis dga' ba nyid du 'gyur //
T09TD4155.2E:327b-1: zhes gsungs pa'i don dang mthun zhing /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-2: lo chen chos skyong bzang po'i bka' drin las sa lo 'jam dpal rdo rje /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-4: skyogs ston smon grub lo ts'a ba /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-5: dpal khang lo ts'a ba dbyangs can snyems pa'i sde sogs skad gnyis smra ba'i lo chen mang du byon zhing /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-6: de dag las brgyud pa'i yang slob dang nyid slob rgya cher gyur pa'i nang tshan sgang rgan 'od zer rgyal mtshan dang grangs chen lo ts'a ba'i drin las smon 'gro ba yab sras sogs tshad thub kyi mkhas pa kha yar byung yang deng song ni zur mkhar blo gros rgyal po'i gsung las /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-7: tshul de lta na yang bur rgyal 'dir //
T09TD4155.2E:327b-8: gzhan kun la phyogs med gtor ba dang //
T09TD4155.2E:327b-9: rang legs bshad tshol bar rlom na yang //
T09TD4155.2E:327b-10: don byin len gnyis ka gser las dkon //
T09TD4155.2E:327b-11: zhes gsungs pa ltar glegs bam 'di nyid pa gzigs pa lhur len pa dkon pa 'dra zhig 'dug kyang /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-12: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa lnga brgya phag bcur gnas par bshad pa'i da lta lnga phrag drug pa'i nang du yod pas gzhung lugs 'di dag 'chad nyan gyis gtan la 'bebs pa'i mkhas pa 'ga' zhig 'ong srid snyam rang gis rang la blo bag nye bar bsros te skad gnyis shan sbyar gyi ma dpe 'di bzhin rgya dpe dang bstun nas thams cad mkhyen pa lo chen chos skyong bzang pos zhus dag mdzad pa'i dpe rgyun yin pas 'khrul pa ga la srid kyang /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-13: bu dpe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par yi ge nor ba'i skyon 'dra yod 'dug pa nas rin spungs sa spyod dbang po'i phyag dpe khungs dag tu byed pa dang bstun 'dar lo ngag dbang phun tshogs kyis 'bru zhus dang /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-14: dogs gnas kyi sar sgra'i dpyad pas gtan la 'bebs pa dang /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-15: rgya bod kyi tshig rkang re gnyis chad pa snon pa dang bsgyur du bcug / khyad par yal 'dab gnyis pa'i /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-16: bdag gis sgyu ma bsgrubs nas ni //
T09TD4155.2E:327b-17: zhes sogs shlo ka gcig gi phyed snga ma'i rkang pa gnyis pa'i skad do rkang pa gzhan rnams ltar kha sgo yang ma'i sdeb sbyor /
T09TD4155.2E:327b-19: snying stobs ldan rnams nang na ni //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-0: zhes sogs shlo ka gcig gi phyed phyi ma'i rkang pa @328a * //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-1: dang por dga' ba'i char gyi skad dod 'bru gsum chad par pri ya ni zhes pa bcug / yal 'dab drug pa'i //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-2: phyis kyang lam ni de nyid nas //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-3: zhes sogs shlo ka gcig gi phyed snga ma'i rkang pa dang po'i skad dod chad pa rkang pa phyi ma gsum dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-5: mi shes rmongs pa sel ba'i bcom ldan 'das ni snying rje bsod nams la brtson pas //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-6: zhes sogs shlo ka gcig gi phyed snga ma'i rkang pa gnyis pa nas 'bad pa'i skad dod yig 'bru gsum chad par aa gong du mtshams sbyar /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-7: ma srog med la aa nu'i aa bcug pa'i dngos bstan pa shya ma zhes pa bcug / yal 'dab dgu pa'i /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-8: nyi zla'i 'od zer nyams byed rin chen rnams dang sa srungs 'od ldan glang po dang //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-9: zhes sogs shlo ka gcig gi phyed snga ma'i rkang pa dang por 'od zer gyi skad dod yig 'bru bzhi chad par bha na w'a kam zhes pa bcug / yal 'dab bcu gnyis par /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-10: de nas dus kyi sa bdag gi / zhes sogs shlo ka gcig gi phyed phyi ma'i rkang pa dang po'i zhes bya ba'i skad dod yig 'bru gsum chad par n'a m'i ya zhes pa bcug / yal 'dab bcu bzhi pa'i /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-11: zad byed rnams kyis mthong bar gyur //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-12: zhes pa'i mthong bar gyur gyi skad dod chad pa darsha sogs yig 'bru drug bcug / yal 'dab sum cu rtsa drug pa'i rgya skad tsa tu ra sogs rkang pa gcig por skad du ma bsgyur 'dug pa /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-13: yongs su spyod pa bzhi yi ni //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-15: yal 'dab zhe gcig pa'i buddha sogs kyi bod skad rkang pa gcig chad pa /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-16: 'jigs pa rtogs shing khong chud pas //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-18: yal 'dab bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'i /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-19: de dag dregs pas khengs pa dang //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-20: zhes pa'i skad dod ched pa rkang pa gzhan rnams dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-21: yal 'dab lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'i /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-22: chos min mang ba'i rgyal srid ces sogs rkang pa gnyis kyi skad dod chad pa rkang pa gzhan gnyis dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-23: yal 'dab drug cu rtsa drug pa'i /
T09TD4155.2E:328a-24: mkha' dang ral gri 'grogs pa yi //
T09TD4155.2E:328a-25: zhes pa'i skad dod rkang pa gcig chad pa rkang pa gzhan gsum dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-0: yal 'dab @328b bdun cu rtsa drug pa'i /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-1: dben par rnam par gnas pa yi //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-2: zhes pa'i skad dod rkang pa gcig chad pa rkang pa gzhan gsum dang mthun par kha sgo phan pa'i sdeb sbyor /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-3: yal 'dab bdun cu rtsa dgu pa'i //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-4: rang gi gnas su sa bdag de //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-5: zhes pa'i skad dod rkang pa gcig dang /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-6: yal 'dab brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'i /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-7: gter ni brgya yis bskor ba de //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-8: zhes pa'i skad dod rkang pa gcig chad pa rnams 'dar pa lo ts'a pa'i rnam dpyod las legs par 'thon zhing /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-10: kye ma sa spyod dpal gyi sdes //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-11: zhes sogs shlo ka gcig gi rgya skad /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-13: de nas gsum pa'i grong khyer bee d'urya rang bzhin //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-14: zhes sogs shlo ka gcig dang /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-15: yal 'dab zhe brgyad pa'i nang gi /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-16: de yis gsal bar 'di brjod tshe //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-18: yal 'dab re gnyis pa'i nang gi /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-19: sa yi bdag po tshangs pas byin //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-20: zhes sogs shlo ka gnyis la skad shan sbyar yod pa'i glegs bam rnams sgo mthun par rgya skad mi 'dug pas /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-21: yal 'dab gnyis pa'i shlo ka gcig pu sdeb sbyor dbang po rdo rje /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-22: yal 'dab drug pa'i shlo ka gcig pu sdeb sbyor nye dbang rdo rje /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-23: yal 'dab zhe brgyad pa'i shlo ka gnyis po sdeb sbyor kha sgo ta yang ma /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-24: yal 'dab re gnyis pa'i shlo ka gnyis po sdeb sbyor rkang bkra'i sgo nas nged rang gis rgya skad du bsgyur /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-26: me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od ldan pa //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-27: zhes pa'i rjes su rgya dper te sh'am sogs tshig rkang gcig gi rgya skad ma gtogs bod skad mi 'dug bar ;
T09TD4155.2E:328b-28: gsal bas de rnams par khyab pas //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-30: yal 'dab re drug pa'i nang gi /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-31: de la dung gi kha zhes pa //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-32: khyi ni 'jigs su rung ba yod //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-33: ces pa 'di rdzogs mtshams su rgya dper banth'asthi sogs tshig rkang gnyis kyi skad dod 'dug pa skad shan sbyar yod pa'i glegs bam tshor bod skad du ma bsgyur bar sa stong bzhag 'dug cing /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-34: thams cad mkhyen pa btsong kha ba chan po'i phyag dpe skad shan sbyar med pa der yang tshig rkang gnyis po de mi 'dug pas /
T09TD4155.2E:328b-35: lam gnas mtha' dag gang mthong ba //
T09TD4155.2E:328b-36: gdon mi za bar rnam 'joms pa //
T09TD4155.2E:329a-1: po 'di rgya dpe las bod skad du bsgyur yod pa slar yang rgya bod kyi yi ge khungs btsun pa'i rigs rnyed na mkhas pa rnams kyis le tshan 'di rnams la dag mi dag gi dpyad pa mdzad dgos yod cing /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-2: rnam dpyod kyi rtsal dang ldan pa rnams la skad shan sbyar yod pa 'di blo bskyed shin tu che ba 'ong 'dug pas /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-3: par du brkos shing mchan bu rnams brkos tshe glegs bam rdzog por song dogs pas /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-4: rdul khrod du g-yo 'gul med par 'jog pa rnams la mchan gyis dgos pa med cing /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-5: blo gros dang brtson par ldan pa rnams kyis mchan bu rnams slar bris chog pa'i dbang du byas te par gyi ma dpe'i sta gon byas pa bzhin /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-6: sa skyong phyag mdzod phrin las rgya mtshos bkod pas khyab par byas na zhus dag pa rab 'byams pa dge 'dun chos 'phel /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-7: lo ts'a ba kun dga' dbang ldan /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-8: par yig pa byams gling pa legs ldan slob mar bcas pa bzhi dang /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-9: par mkhan mkhas pa yon bdag tshe ring sogs par mkhas rnams kyis lus ngag yid gsum 'bad pas bsgrims te /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-10: khro mo zhes pa shing pho 'brug lo'i zla ba lnga pa'i tshes lnga res bza' phur bu dang skar ma rgyal gyi 'grub sbyor yod pa'i nyin dbu btsugs /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-11: shing mo sprul gyi lo'i tha skar gyi zla ba'i tshes bco lnga la legs par grub pa'i dge bas lus can mtha' dag rnam 'dren bu ram shing pa slob pa lam gyi gnas skabs kyi mdzad pa dang mtshungs par bslabs te 'bras bu chos gzugs kyi sku mngon du byed pa'i dga' ston la spyod par gyur cig //
T09TD4155.2E:329a-12: /'di'i legs sbyar skad la yi ge pas bslad pa'i 'bru nor mang du mchis pa bar du 'khod skabs kho bos dbu nas yig ldeb bzhi bcu skor tsam bcos zin mtshams /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-13: sa skyong bstan pa tshe ring dpon blon dag snang ha cang 'byams ches pas /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-14: po ta la'i phyi mo 'di mkhas pa mang pos zhus dag byas pa'i par yig yid ches yin pas ma dag pa yod pa mi srid pas bzo bcos ma byed ces bka' lung lan gnyis kyang stsal bas 'chos dbang ma byung bar rang sor bzhag pa yin pas /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-15: slan chad blo gros ldan pa dag gis zhu dag byed pa byung na bstan pa'i byi dor byas par 'gyur bas dgongs par 'jog mdzod /
T09TD4155.2E:329a-16: ces pa'ang tshul rin gyis gleng ba'o /
